author: Zoe Schiffer
title: How Medium became the best and worst place for coronavirus news
description: Medium has become a central hub for information about COVID-19, but it’s also helped elevate conspiracy theorists are unverified health information.
content: Illustration by Grayson Blackmon On March 20th, an article about the novel coronavirus started to spread. “Evidence over hysteria — COVID-19” crystallized a viewpoint conservatives had been hawking for some time: the hysteria over the virus was overhyped. The… [+10986 chars]
